attributes.action: prevent Derbyshire County Council from closing Combs Infant School
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Derbyshire County Council proposes to close Combs Infant School, which was described by Ofsted as "outstanding value for money" and rated outstanding in every category. The school operates in a building which also provides a Village Hall and Chapel, and is the only community building in the village. All of these functions are threatened by DCC's proposal.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "prevent Derbyshire County Council from closing Combs Infant School."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here:
